description: ISA-88 batch unit profile. Represents a process unit (e.g., bioreactor, mixer) with batch execution context including recipe, phase, formula, batch ID, and operator interaction fields. All process data sourced from OPC.
applicableTo: ISA-88 batch process units with recipe execution context

attributes.name: ShortName
attributes.description: Human-readable equipment name used in UNS topic path

attributes.name: ProfileDefinition
attributes.description: URL to the SM Profile definition that this instance conforms to

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Free-text description of the equipment instance

BatchContext.description: ISA-88 batch execution context - recipe, phase, state, and operator interaction. All values sourced from OPC.

attributes.name: State
attributes.description: Current unit state (e.g., Running, Idle, Held)

attributes.name: Message1
attributes.description: Primary operator message from batch engine

attributes.name: Message2
attributes.description: Secondary operator message from batch engine
